title: Fake News: Pamela Anderson: Famous Playboy Model and Baywatch Star NOT DEAD at Age 50 | Lead Stories
subtitle: Actress Pamela Anderson has not died, contrary to a report trending on social media as detected by Lead Stories' Trendolizer....
author: leadstories.com
vclaim:
Actress Pamela Anderson has not died, contrary to a report trending on social media as detected by Lead Stories' Trendolizer. We've checked the beach. She is still alive. ABCNews-us.com is a fake news site, mocked up to trick you into thinking it is affiliated with the real American TV network.

The story originated from an article published on March 16, 2018 titled "Pamela Anderson: Famous Playboy Model and Baywatch Star Dies Aged 50" (archived here) which opened:

Users on social media only saw this title, description and thumbnail:

World famous Playboy model and Baywatch starlet Pamela Anderson has died at the age of 50. At 8:00 am on March 12, the Los Angeles Fire Department responded to "a medical request" at the Los Angeles home of Anderson. She...
